select.if: select TABLE_COMMENT from information_schema.TABLES t where t.TABLE_SCHEMA=#{dbName} and TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
SELECT DISTINCT t.TABLE_NAME, t.comments FROM user_tab_comments t INNER JOIN USER_CONS_COLUMNS A ON A.TABLE_NAME = T.TABLE_NAME AND A.OWNER=#{dbName} WHERE t.TABLE_NAME=#{tableName}
SELECT DISTINCT t.TABLE_NAME, t.comments TABLE_COMMENT FROM user_tab_comments t INNER JOIN USER_CONS_COLUMNS A ON A.TABLE_NAME = T.TABLE_NAME AND A.OWNER = #{dbName}
select name as TABLENAME from sysobjects where xtype='u'

SELECT COLUMN_NAME COLUMNNAME,COLUMN_TYPE COLUMNTYPE,COLUMN_KEY COLUMNKEY ,CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH DATALENGTH, IS_NULLABLE ISNULLABLE,COLUMN_COMMENT COLUMNCOMMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS T WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND T.TABLE_SCHEMA=#{dbName}

SELECT DISTINCT t.column_name COLUMNNAME, t.data_type COLUMNTYPE, a.COMMENTS COLUMNCOMMENT FROM user_tab_columns t INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS a ON t.table_name = a.table_NAME AND t.COLUMN_NAME = a.COLUMN_NAME INNER JOIN USER_CONS_COLUMNS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = T.TABLE_NAME WHERE C.OWNER = #{dbName} AND T.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
SELECT COLUMN_NAME COLUMNNAME,DATA_TYPE COLUMNTYPE,CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH DATALENGTH, IS_NULLABLE ISNULLABLE,'' COLUMNCOMMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.columns WHERE TABLE_NAME=#{tableName}
SELECT DISTINCT column_name FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.`KEY_COLUMN_USAGE` WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND constraint_name='PRIMARY'

SELECT A.COLUMN_NAME FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_CONSTRAINTS B ON A.CONSTRAINT_NAME = B.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND B.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND A.OWNER = #{dbName}
